While all of the politicians listed are known for their leadership and political prowess, Angela Merkel stands out as someone who is particularly adept at managing her own sleep schedule. As the first female Chancellor of Germany, Merkel has had to navigate a male-dominated political landscape, and her ability to rest and recharge at night has been crucial to her success.

Merkel is known for her disciplined approach to sleep, waking up at the same time every day and sticking to a consistent routine. This allows her to be well-rested and alert when she needs to be, whether she's meeting with world leaders or addressing the German parliament.

In contrast, some of the other politicians on the list may be more prone to staying up late or waking up late, which could impact their ability to function at their best during the day. For example, Donald Trump is known for his unpredictable sleep schedule, while Vladimir Putin has been known to work late into the night and then take long naps during the day.

Overall, while all of these politicians are skilled leaders, Angela Merkel's ability to manage her sleep schedule and prioritize rest when needed makes her the most effective choice for a person who sleeps at night.
